data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Ceriantheomorphe (Cnidaria, Anthozoa, Ceriantharia) with description of a new species from the Gulf of Mexico and northwestern Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lopes, Celine S. S., Ceriello, Hellen, Morandini, Andre C., Stampar, Sergio N. (2019): Revision of the genus Ceriantheomorphe (Cnidaria, Anthozoa, Ceriantharia) with description of a new species from the Gulf of Mexico and northwestern Atlantic. ZooKeys 874: 127-148, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.874.35835, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.874.35835
